javax.constraints.impl

Class CommonBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.constraints.impl.CommonBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractConstrainedVariable, AbstractConstraint, AbstractReversible, AbstractSearchStrategy

    public class CommonBase
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a base implementation for all types of problem objects that refer to the problem and have an associated name, business objects, implementation, etc.

      • getImpl

        public final java.lang.Object getImpl()
        This method should be defined by a concrete solver implementation. This method returns an Object that represents an actual implementation of this object inside an underlying solver.
        Returns:
        an Object that represents an actual implementation of this Constrained Object inside an underlying solver.
